channel.title: I will pay for it
channel.description:
Firts of all i dont know why cookie edited and closed my last post... i didnt say i deob that client, i was asking for help to deob a decompile it... Since i tryed with all decompiler and couldnt do it, im looking for someone with more experience than me, that can do it... i can pay a rasonable amount if its necesary, or i can make co-owner, i have my own vps, and i just wanna host this server.. I also tryed to contact the guy that already decompiled it, but he seems to never be online...
So i need help on this if anyone can do it please let me know, here is the link of the client, i just need someone to change the ip to mine xsystex.no-ip.info, thats all, there is only a class file to modify, the one named UZ.Class, thats all...
Thanks in advance

item.title: I will pay for it
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

You have missed my point. The whole point that you have to decompile the client to edit it because the creator does not want people like yourself using it. I should email/pm the creator for the source and pay him, not us. If you cannot contact him: Tough.

I apologise that I did not explain the original lock properly.
If you wish to continue this discussion please PM me- just dont make silly posts like this.

Read full topic
